name: Trekking in Markha Valley
description:
Ascend to a celestial land where the air is fresher, skies are clearer, landscapes are pristine and where the snow of the alluring mountains appear to extend to the cotton candy clouds. For any trekking aficionado, the experience of Himalayas is a must. Nestled amongst these towering ranges is Markha Valley, a trekker’s paradise. The tour offers the unique experience of this.

Bask in the breath-taking sights, trek up misty hills and camp at alpine grass lands and discover tranquillity at the artistic monasteries.
